00024 /* a dynamic string implementation using macros 
00025  * see http://uthash.sourceforge.net/utstring
00026  */
00027 #ifndef UTSTRING_H
00028 #define UTSTRING_H
00029 
00030 #define UTSTRING_VERSION 1.9.1
00031 
00032 #ifdef __GNUC__
00033 #define _UNUSED_ __attribute__ ((__unused__)) 
00034 #else
00035 #define _UNUSED_ 
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #include <stdlib.h>
00039 #include <string.h>
00040 #include <stdarg.h>
00041 #define oom() exit(-1)
00042 
00043 typedef struct {
00044     char *d;
00045     size_t n; /* allocd size */
00046     size_t i; /* index of first unused byte */
00047 } UT_string;
00048 
00049 #define utstring_reserve(s,amt)                            \
00050 do {                                                       \
00051   if (((s)->n - (s)->i) < (size_t)(amt)) {                 \
00052      (s)->d = (char*)realloc((s)->d, (s)->n + amt);        \
00053      if ((s)->d == NULL) oom();                            \
00054      (s)->n += amt;                                        \
00055   }                                                        \
00056 } while(0)
00057 
00058 #define utstring_init(s)                                   \
00059 do {                                                       \
00060   (s)->n = 0; (s)->i = 0; (s)->d = NULL;                   \
00061   utstring_reserve(s,100);                                 \
00062 } while(0)
00063 
00064 #define utstring_done(s)                                   \
00065 do {                                                       \
00066   if ((s)->d != NULL) free((s)->d);                        \
00067   (s)->n = 0;                                              \
00068 } while(0)
00069 
00070 #define utstring_free(s)                                   \
00071 do {                                                       \
00072   utstring_done(s);                                        \
00073   free(s);                                                 \
00074 } while(0)
00075 
00076 #define utstring_new(s)                                    \
00077 do {                                                       \
00078    s = (UT_string*)calloc(sizeof(UT_string),1);            \
00079    if (!s) oom();                                          \
00080    utstring_init(s);                                       \
00081 } while(0)
00082 
00083 #define utstring_clear(s)                                  \
00084 do {                                                       \
00085   (s)->i = 0;                                              \
00086 } while(0)
00087 
00088 #define utstring_bincpy(s,b,l)                             \
00089 do {                                                       \
00090   utstring_reserve(s,(l)+1);                               \
00091   if (l) memcpy(&(s)->d[(s)->i], b, l);                    \
00092   s->i += l;                                               \
00093   s->d[s->i]='\0';                                         \
00094 } while(0)
00095 
00096 #define utstring_concat(dst,src)                           \
00097 do {                                                       \
00098   utstring_reserve(dst,(src->i)+1);                        \
00099   if (src->i) memcpy(&(dst)->d[(dst)->i], src->d, src->i); \
00100   dst->i += src->i;                                        \
00101   dst->d[dst->i]='\0';                                     \
00102 } while(0)
00103 
00104 #define utstring_len(s) ((unsigned)((s)->i))
00105 
00106 #define utstring_body(s) ((s)->d)
00107 
00108 _UNUSED_ static void utstring_printf_va(UT_string *s, const char *fmt, va_list ap) {
00109    int n;
00110    va_list cp;
00111    while (1) {
00112 #ifdef _WIN32
00113       cp = ap;
00114 #else
00115       va_copy(cp, ap);
00116 #endif
00117       n = vsnprintf (&s->d[s->i], s->n-s->i, fmt, cp);
00118       va_end(cp);
00119 
00120       if ((n > -1) && (n < (int)(s->n-s->i))) {
00121         s->i += n;
00122         return;
00123       }
00124 
00125       /* Else try again with more space. */
00126       if (n > -1) utstring_reserve(s,n+1); /* exact */
00127       else utstring_reserve(s,(s->n)*2);   /* 2x */
00128    }
00129 }
00130 _UNUSED_ static void utstring_printf(UT_string *s, const char *fmt, ...) {
00131    va_list ap;
00132    va_start(ap,fmt);
00133    utstring_printf_va(s,fmt,ap);
00134    va_end(ap);
00135 }
00136 
00137 #endif /* UTSTRING_H */
